chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: Ordered.sort Label
f: input -> option nat
prec: input -> bool
prec_valid: forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v
cls: seq nid
cs: seq nid
Huniq: is_true (uniq nodes)
sv: nid
Hs: is_true (sv \in cs)
s: Sstate
args: Equality.sort (seq_eqType nat_eqType)

Goal:
state_wf s -> forall v : nat, lookup_mem_table s args = Some v -> f args = Some v

Premises:
lookup_mem_table = fix lookup_mem_table (s : Sstate) (args : seq_eqType nat_eqType) {struct s} : option nat := match s with | [::] => None | x :: xs => if x.1 == args then Some x.2 else lookup_mem_table xs args end : Sstate -> seq_eqType nat_eqType -> option nat Arguments lookup_mem_table _%seq_scope
seq_eqType = fun T : eqType => EqType (seq T) (seq_eqMixin T) : eqType -> eqType
state_wf = fun s : Sstate => forall e : prod_eqType (seq_eqType nat_eqType) nat_eqType, e \in s -> f e.1 = Some e.2 : Sstate -> Prop Arguments state_wf _%seq_scope
uniq : seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- eqType]
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- Type]
Module Ordered := Struct Record mixin_of (T : Equality.Exports.eqType) : Type := Mixin { ordering : rel T; _ : irreflexive (T:=T) ordering; _ : transitive (T:=T) ordering; _ : forall x y : T, [|| ordering x y, x == y | ordering y x] } Definition ordering : forall T : Equality.Exports.eqType, mixin_of T -> rel T. Record class_of (T : Type) : Type := Class { base : Equality.mixin_of T; mixin : mixin_of (EqType T base) } Definition base : forall T : Type, class_of T -> Equality.mixin_of T. Definition mixin : forall (T : Type)
input = Exports.input : Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation seq := list
Module Equality := Struct Definition block : forall A : Type, A -> A. Parameter JMeq_eq_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), JMeq_eq JMeq_refl = erefl x. Parameter UIP_refl_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A), UIP_refl A x (erefl x) = erefl (erefl x). Parameter inj_pairT2_refl : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (P : A -> Type) (p : P x), inj_pairT2 A P x p p (erefl (existT P x p)) = erefl p. Record DependentEliminationPackage (A : Type) : Type := Build
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Notation nodes := (cs ++ cls)
eqP : reflect (?x = ?y) (?x == ?y) where ?T : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- eqType] ?x : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- Equality.sort ?T]
find_some : find ?k ?f = Some ?v -> ?k \in dom ?f where ?K : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- ordType] ?V : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- UMC.sort ?U]
um_eta2 : find ?k ?f = Some ?v -> ?f = pts ?k ?v \+ free ?k ?f where ?K : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- ordType] ?V : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- UMC.sort ?U]
esym : ?x = ?y -> ?y = ?x where ?A : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- Type] ?x : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- ?A]
pts : ?K -> ?V -> ?cT where ?K : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- ordType] ?V : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- union_map_class ?K ?V]
map : (?T1 -> ?T2) -> seq ?T1 -> seq ?T2 where ?T1 : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- Type] ?T2 : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- Type]

hasP : reflect (exists2 x : ?T, x \in ?s & ?a x) (has ?a ?s) where ?T : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- eqType] ?a : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- seq ?T]
Mem : ?pT -> Mem_Pred ?T where ?T : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- Type] ?pT : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- PredType ?T]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- Type] ?B : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- Type]
mem : ?pT -> mem_pred ?T where ?T : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- Type] ?pT : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- predType ?T]

andP : reflect (?b1 /\ ?b2) (?b1 && ?b2) where ?b1 : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- bool] ?b2 : [l : Label f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes sv : nid Hs : sv \in cs s : Sstate args : seq_eqType nat_eqType |- bool]
